stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 5 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Reveal the top card of R&D. Draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: When you score this agenda, place 5 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Reveal the top card of R&D. Draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Flower Sermon
